General.Name: Cavatina Holding S.A.
General.Description: Cavatina Holding Spólka Akcyjna engages in the development of office space in Poland. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Kraków, Poland. Cavatina Holding Spólka Akcyjna operates as a subsidiary of CAVATINA spolka zograniczona odpowiedzialnoscia.
